@Test public void testReducingBall1(){
  List<Vector2D> list=buildList(0.05380958511396061,0.57332359658700000,0.99348810731127870,0.02056421361521466,0.01203950647796437,0.99779675042261860,0.00810189987706078,0.00589246003827815,0.00465180821202149,0.99219972923046940);
  checkDisk(list,Arrays.asList(list.get(1),list.get(3),list.get(4)));
}
